reviews.text: We sat outside on their patio and enjoyed a great meal and fun cocktails.  The sunchokes were fried and almost resembled potatoes.   I like this dish but...
Comune is a really special place.  The bright, airy, beautiful interior is enough to set it apart and then you include the delicious cocktails and food?...
I was super excited to come to Comune after it has been on my to-do list for so long. I came with coworkers one evening to try the Spring 2023 menu, and was...
